job_description: Key Responsibilities: Provides support during installation of telematics system at infleeting Verifies vehicle functionality by testing and re-programming circuits, equipment and alarms: identifying and correcting problems; consulting and liasing with Associate Fleet Manager Maintains Fleet network by troubleshooting and repairing malfunctioning vehicle hardware; testing network backup procedures; updating database and documentation Maintains safe work environment by following standards and policies Maintains the appearance and functionality of Repair shop space and fleet vehicles Maintains electronic and paper filing system Supports marketing, member service and fleet team as required Coordinates special projects as required Other Administrative tasks as assigned Ability to work independently and under supervision
job_requirements: Education/ExperiencePreferred Minimum 2 years of study in either telecommunication, engineering, electrical diagnostics or minimum level 2/ second year Automotive apprentice. Minimum 2 years of experience in an Automotive Environment a definite assetOther Skills Superior verbal as well as written skills, particularly in report writing with a strong attention to detail. Medium to high level of mechanical and or electrical and or programming aptitude Demonstrated ability to multi-task and work efficiently within deadlines. Demonstrated problem solving and analytical skills. Proven ability to work independently in both indoor and outdoor environments at multiple locations in various weather conditions Proven ability to complete projects from start to finishIntermediate knowledge of MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, Outlook). Proven experience with Automotive telematics software/hardware is an asset Proven communication skills(written/verbal) and ability to effectively communicate with various levels of management, team members and/or outside contacts Proven ability to interpret and communicate moderate to complex data Demonstrated ability to work effectively in a team oriented, high demand and fast paced environment Proven ability to establish solid interpersonal relationships, work independently with high initiative Proven ability to multi-task, high attention to detail orientation and prioritize work in a fast paced environment Basic Automotive tool knowledge Intermediate knowledge of MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, Outlook).Open To All Majors:No
